name: Virtual Reality Locomotion simulator
description:
Hello, I am a Solent University student studying BSc Computer Games (Software Development) and the purpose of this technical demo is to gain feedback on my Final Major Project topic.

The project's objective is to gain user feedback on common and less common Virtual Reality locomotion methods that you may have used before. This technical demo has seven different methods that can be used without changing the game level or environment. This is your chance to give feedback on what locomotion method you liked the best and which one you liked the least.

Please fill in the form that can be found in the game folder
